poem:
### The Reckoning

Upon the ancient soil of Lebanon,
the earth quakes with iron and fire.
Lamentations rise from the wounded valleys,
while voices of reason fade,
lost in the clash of steel and souls.
The prophets stand, tear-streaked and stern,
as man's blind folly turns
the dawn to dusk once more.
